Comment: Trump and his administration aren't alone in this. Our entire ruling class, Mr. Biden and his ghouls included, have worked to push us into this era of "soft eugenics."  Choosing to normalize an ongoing pandemic to prioritize profit is eugenics. Its was a decision to discontinue protections and programs. It was a decision to make the world a more dangerous place for the elderly and the immunocompromised. It was a decision to place nearly everyone, including children, at risk of long-term illness and complications due to repeat Covid-19 infections.  Negligence isn't inevitable. This level of disregard for basic humanity isn't inevitable. This is all the product of a sociopathic system called capitalism--a system that prioritizes the few at the expense of the many.  While Trump and his administration's cruelty may shock us, understand that he is not unique. His actions resemble those of our more "moderate" politicians and bureaucrats. The shock comes from the degree of action and the lack of obfuscation.
